description: This file defines the NetworkConfigChangedEvent class which extends Event. It represents an event triggered when network configuration changes, providing a method to retrieve dummy network configuration data.

classes.name: NetworkConfigChangedEvent
classes.description: A class representing a network configuration change event, extending the base Event class and providing a method to access network config data.

methods.name: NetworkConfigChangedEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with the type 'networkConfigChanged'.

methods.name: getNetworkConfigData
methods.description: Returns a hardcoded base64-encoded string representing network configuration data.
